EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO / W2 contact information. (1349125013.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO / W2 contact information. (1349125013.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Paul, I got your message earlier and I apologize I have not had any time to reach out to you and am about to jump on another call, but would like to speak with you tomorrow if that works for you? I have included a link to my calendar below so you may easily schedule a time that works for you. Click here to schedule time <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCel1crWd%2F5eiLN7rkkDvTbpe4q7lvGrnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> I look forward to speaking with you soon! Have a great evening,Nicolette From: John Berry [mailto:berry@hireme2.com] Sent: Monday, October 01, 2012 3:06 PM To: Paul Davis; Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO / W2 contact information. Subject: MBO / W2 contact information. Nicolette: Paul Davis has an offer from M&T Bank from 10/15/2012 thru 4/26/2013 and needs to be informed of MBO’s services.He’s not been at M&T Bank before I’m giving him your contact information via this email and he might be contacting you in the near future. Paul : Below is contact information for Nicolette at MBO partners.Don’t know if I told you but they basically take 5% of the $73/hr. pay rate to handle the “stuff” but you have many options and ways to handle it all with them.Everyone that has talked to Nicolette find her to be very helpful. Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Corporate statement: -That the activities that I engage in my work with other people, inspires them and enriches their lives. -That I am an opening thru which energy flows from the Source of all life, for the benefit of all. John BerryJohn Berry Personnel Consultants 800-HIRE-ME2berry@hireme2.com <mailto:berry@hireme2.com>
